__e: Please, just shut up for a little while here.
- Stop talking and get on the bike.

Oh. The last thing I said to him was, "Suck it."
Who told you, you could tell me to shut up?
Hey, hey, hey. I don't know why, but I do like you. I don't want them to hurt you, so just do yourself a favor and shut up.
Give yourselves a round of applause.
Come on, guys. Give it up for him.

Uh, pat yourselves on the back, and, in fact, take an early lunch.
